SELECT /* kr.co.wisenut.mapper.CollectionMapper.getCollectionDetail */ COLLECTION_ID AS "collectionId" , COLLECTION_NAME AS "collectionName" , COLLECTION_TYPE AS "collectionType" , COLLECTION_JOB AS "collectionJob" , COLLECTION_DESC AS "collectionDesc" , COLLECTION_OWNER AS "collectionOwner" , COALESCE(FIELD_INFO, TO_CLOB(' ')) AS "fieldInfo" , COALESCE(ORIGINAL_FIELD_INFO, TO_CLOB(' ')) AS "originalFieldInfo" , COALESCE(DOCUMENT_FIELD, TO_CLOB(' ')) AS "documentField" , COALESCE((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WISETM_DOCUMENTS WHERE COLLECTION_ID = WTC.COLLECTION_ID), 0) AS "documentCount" , TO_CHAR(CRE_DT, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS "creDt" FROM WISETM_COLLECTIONS WTC WHERE COLLECTION_ID = #{collectionId}
AND COLLECTION_OWNER = #{collectionOwner}

SELECT /* kr.co.wisenut.mapper.CollectionMapper.getCollectionDetailUseModel */ COLLECTION_ID AS "collectionId" , COLLECTION_NAME AS "collectionName" , COLLECTION_TYPE AS "collectionType" , COLLECTION_JOB AS "collectionJob" , COLLECTION_DESC AS "collectionDesc" , COLLECTION_OWNER AS "collectionOwner" , COALESCE(FIELD_INFO, TO_CLOB(' ')) AS "fieldInfo" , COALESCE(ORIGINAL_FIELD_INFO, TO_CLOB(' ')) AS "originalFieldInfo" , COALESCE(DOCUMENT_FIELD, TO_CLOB(' ')) AS "documentField" , COALESCE((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WISETM_DOCUMENTS WHERE COLLECTION_ID = WTC.COLLECTION_ID), 0) AS "documentCount" , TO_CHAR(CRE_DT, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS "creDt" FROM WISETM_COLLECTIONS WTC WHERE COLLECTION_ID = (SELECT COLLECTION_ID FROM WISETM_TASK WHERE TASK_ID = #{taskId} AND PROJECT_ID = #{projectId})
AND COLLECTION_OWNER = #{collectionOwner}
mapper.sql: ( SELECT TMP.* , CEIL( TMP.SEQ / #{pageSize} ) AS PAGE_ROW FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS SEQ , WTC.COLLECTION_ID , WTC.COLLECTION_NAME , WTC.COLLECTION_TYPE , WTC.COLLECTION_JOB , WTC.COLLECTION_DESC , WTC.COLLECTION_OWNER , WTC.FIELD_INFO , WTC.ORIGINAL_FIELD_INFO , WTC.DOCUMENT_FIELD , COALESCE(WTD.DOCUMENT_COUNT, 0) AS DOCUMENT_COUNT , WTC.CRE_DT , WTC.CRE_USER , WTC.MOD_DT , WTC.MOD_USER FROM WISETM_COLLECTIONS WTC LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT COLLECTION_ID , COUNT(*) AS DOCUMENT_COUNT FROM WISETM_DOCUMENTS GROUP BY COLLECTION_ID ) WTD ON WTC.COLLECTION_ID = WTD.COLLECTION_ID ORDER BY WTC.COLLECTION_ID DESC ) TMP ) TOTAL
